text: Eṉiṉum avviruvarukkum maṟaintirunta avarkaḷuṭaiya (uṭalai) māṉattai avarkaḷukku veḷippaṭuttum poruṭṭu ṣaittāṉ avviruvariṉ uḷḷaṅkaḷil (tavaṟāṉa eṇṇaṅkaḷai) ūcalāṭac ceytāṉ; (avarkaḷai nōkki, "ataṉ kaṉiyai nīṅkaḷ pucittāl) nīṅkaḷ iruvarum malakkukaḷāy viṭuvīrkaḷ, allatu (iccuvaṉapatiyil) eṉṟeṉṉum taṅkiviṭuvīrkaḷ eṉpataṟkākavēyaṉṟi (vēṟetaṟkum,) inta marattai viṭṭum uṅkaḷai uṅkaḷ iṟaivaṉ taṭukkavillai" eṉṟu kūṟiṉāṉ
